languages.text: "Могу ответить тебе тем же. Сияние твоей души ослепляет мой взор — до слез и боли в висках. Нам лучше... держаться на расстоянии".
"I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."
languages.original_text: "Могу ответить тебе тем же. Сияние твоей души ослепляет мой взор — до слез и боли в висках. Нам лучше... держаться на расстоянии".

traits.locale_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “我正有此意。你灵魂的光彩让我头晕目眩，甚至让我眼睛发疼，泪流不已。我们最好保持距离。”
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: “我正有此意。你灵魂的光彩让我头晕目眩，甚至让我眼睛发疼，泪流不已。我们最好保持距离。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Il en est de même pour moi. L'éclat de votre âme m'éblouit... à tel point que je pourrais en pleurer. Nous devrions en effet garder nos distances. »
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: « Il en est de même pour moi. L'éclat de votre âme m'éblouit... à tel point que je pourrais en pleurer. Nous devrions en effet garder nos distances. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Das gebe ich gerne zurück. Das Starren Eurer Seele blendet meine Sicht — so sehr, dass es schmerzt, so sehr, dass mir die Tränen kommen. Wir sollten Abstand voneinander halten."
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: "Das gebe ich gerne zurück. Das Starren Eurer Seele blendet meine Sicht — so sehr, dass es schmerzt, so sehr, dass mir die Tränen kommen. Wir sollten Abstand voneinander halten."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「そのままそっくりお返ししましょう。あなたの魂のまぶしさが私の目にまぶしく映る…目が痛いほどです。距離を置いたほうがいいでしょう」
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: 「そのままそっくりお返ししましょう。あなたの魂のまぶしさが私の目にまぶしく映る…目が痛いほどです。距離を置いたほうがいいでしょう」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Te diré lo mismo. El resplandor de tu alma ciega mi vista hasta el punto de hacerme daño y de hacer que me lloren los ojos. Será mejor guardar las distancias».
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: «Te diré lo mismo. El resplandor de tu alma ciega mi vista hasta el punto de hacerme daño y de hacer que me lloren los ojos. Será mejor guardar las distancias».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

languages.text: "Ben de sana aynısını söyleyeceğim. Ruhunun parıltısı gözlerimi acı verecek, gözyaşı akıtacak raddede kamaştırıyor. Mesafemizi korumalıyız."
languages.original_text: "I will say the same to you. The glare of your soul dazzles my sight — to the point of pain, to the point of tears. We should keep our distance."

traits.locale_text: "Ben de sana aynısını söyleyeceğim. Ruhunun parıltısı gözlerimi acı verecek, gözyaşı akıtacak raddede kamaştırıyor. Mesafemizi korumalıyız."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
